title: Scientists ask WHO to acknowledge threat of airborne coronavirus transmission
description: In an open letter, experts request that the WHO revise its guidelines to be clearer amid polarizing debates over mask wearing.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Many Florida hospitals on the brink as coronavirus cases surge
description: In four months, Florida registered 100,000 cases, but it doubled to 200,000 cases in the last week.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Watch: British athlete records police pulling her out of car for ‘suspicious driving’
description: British sprinter Bianca Williams recorded London police pulling her and her partner out of their car for alleged suspicious driving. The police wanted to search for weapons and drugs, but found neither.
source.name: NBC News

title: Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms says she tested positive for COVID-19
description: Atlanta mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms said in a tweet on Monday that she tested positive for coronavirus, despite being asymptomatic.
content:

title: McConnell opens door to more coronavirus stimulus checks for low-income Americans
